Title: Extends the required publishing date for the first annual report regarding the impact of laws pertaining to discovery in criminal cases
Summary: Extends the required publishing date for the first annual report regarding the impact of laws pertaining to discovery in criminal cases to twenty-one months after the effective date of the section.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to extending the required publishing date for the first annual report regarding the impact of laws pertaining to discovery in criminal cases
